scenario_text.value: Oooooohhh...
Holes... Holes...
More... Must drill more holes...
This world will soon fade.

For my wish to be fulfilled...these are
insufficient.
In other words, you want more sacrifices?
Then, if I brought you more sacrifices...
...would you let her go?
You want the maiden, do you...?

As far as your options for allies go,
I don’t think I’m a bad one.

I suppose Archnemon and Piemon failed
to live up to your expectations...

Still, I can offer you plenty more humans
than they ever could.
I thought you might say something better...

I never...expected them...
to be of any use!
Tch...
I’m different from them!

I’m not some clingy brown-noser like they
were! I have a will of my own! A strong one!

If I were to bring you more sacrifices, that
would be enough to save this world, right?
Then you’ll do what I ask...

...and let Miyuki go? In exchange for the
sacrifices?
Oooooohhh...

Very well. The moment that my wish is
fulfilled...
I shall relinquish this vessel.
Then...it’s a deal.

(I was always at her side...at Miyuki’s
side.)

(That she reacted to that person was a mere
coincidence. I’ll get her back.)

(That’s right, I’m the one who’ll make you
happy, Miyuki. The only one.)

(Hang in there just a little longer. I’m
going to save you, I promise...)
